Home -> Events -> Cat Battle Current online:



Description: Players are transported in the form of cats, where there are 2 types: cat archer and cat mage. They have unique skills, but all characteristics are equal, making the outcome of battles dependent only on your skill, and not on character bonuses.
Conditions for registration: Level 76 and 3 rebirths.
Goal: Kill as many opponents from other teams as possible.
Schedule (GMT +3): 00:00, 03:00, 06:00, 09:00, 12:00, 15:00, 18:00, 21:00.
Reward: Winning Ticket 2 pcs. and Hidden Card 2 pcs.
Reward for top kills: Winning Ticket 2 pcs. and Hidden Card 2 pcs.
